description: This file defines a custom Flutter theme configuration class 'AppTheme' that provides styling options like colors, text styles, button themes, and other UI component themes for a Flutter app. It includes a method to generate a light theme using the Ocean Professional style.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A class that encapsulates theme configuration for Flutter app, providing static methods and constants for styling.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured with Ocean Professional styling for light mode.
